text: The appointment of a special administrator terminates either upon the appointment of a personal representative or in the same manner provided in subchapter III of this chapter for the suspension and termination of a personal representative.

chapter.text: The Personal Representative and Special Administrator; Appointment, Control and Termination of Authority.
